marklogic.body: Furthermore, it is a crappy product not because I don't use it but because I find that it has just as many problems as other products that are less expansive and the other products addresses those problems a lot quicker than Apple does. For example, how many times does the browser on your iPod/iPhone/IPad crashes? As I recall, it was quite often. My $3000 MacBook Pro's motherboard broke down after only about a year and half whereas my Sony Viao is still running (albeit not greatly) after 5 years of usage. My $3000 MacBook Pro's screen Burned out a little after my motherboard was replaced so had that to be replaced as well. Not to mention the horrible CD/DVD/BluRay ROM drive design.
